# Function reference

## Core Classes

Main classes for infant eye-tracking research

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [InfantStimuli](/api/InfantStimuli.qmd) | Stimuli for infant-friendly calibration. |
| [TobiiController](/api/TobiiController.qmd) | Tobii controller for infant research. |

## Calibration and Recording Methods

Methods for managing eye-tracking calibration and data recording

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [save_calibration](/api/save_calibration.qmd) | Save calibration data to a file. |
| [load_calibration](/api/load_calibration.qmd) | Load calibration data from a file. |
| [start_recording](/api/start_recording.qmd) | Start recording gaze data with improved thread handling. |
| [stop_recording](/api/stop_recording.qmd) | Stop recording with improved thread handling. |
| [record_event](/api/record_event.qmd) | Record an event with a timestamp. |
| [save_data](/api/save_data.qmd) | Save gaze and event data to files. |
| [run_calibration](/api/run_calibration.qmd) | Run an infant-friendly calibration procedure with point selection and |
| [show_status](/api/show_status.qmd) | Show participant's gaze position in track box. |
| [close](/api/close.qmd) | Clean up and ensure all data is saved. |

## Coordinate transformation functions

Functions for coordinate transformation

| | |
| --- | --- |
| [get_psychopy_pos](/api/get_psychopy_pos.qmd) | Convert Tobii ADCS coordinates to PsychoPy coordinates. |
| [get_tobii_pos](/api/get_tobii_pos.qmd) | Convert PsychoPy coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates. |
| [pix2tobii](/api/pix2tobii.qmd) | Convert PsychoPy pixel coordinates to Tobii ADCS coordinates. |
| [tobii2pix](/api/tobii2pix.qmd) | Convert Tobii ADCS coordinates to PsychoPy pixel coordinates. |
| [get_psychopy_pos_from_trackbox](/api/get_psychopy_pos_from_trackbox.qmd) | Convert Tobii TBCS coordinates to PsychoPy coordinates. |
